title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 460.1 - Applicability of law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 460.1 - Applicability of law

State Regulations

No snowmobile shall be operated on the roadway or
shoulder of a public street or highway at any time, unless the owner of such
snowmobile has obtained a policy of insurance in such language and form as
shall be determined and established by the Superintendent of

Insurance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
460.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
